wisetrainerPricing.title: WiseTrainer Pricing
wisetrainerPricing.subtitle: Create your custom 3D environment
wisetrainerPricing.description: Developing your 3D asset is an initial investment. Then, each scenario costs 500 euros.

profiles.title: Who are you?
profiles.subtitle: Discover how WiseTwin meets your specific needs

whatIsWisetwin.question: What is WiseTwin?
whatIsWisetwin.answer: WiseTwin is a 100% online industrial training solution using immersive 3D environments. It transforms your traditional training into interactive and engaging experiences, faithful to your business reality.

howHelps.question: How can WiseTwin help my company?
howHelps.answer: WiseTwin helps reduce risks, improve employee engagement, and optimize training costs. You can simulate dangerous situations safely, train your teams on your actual 3D installations, and track each learner's progress.

deploymentTime.question: How long does it take to deploy WiseTwin?
deploymentTime.answer: Access to the WiseTwin platform is immediate. With WisePaper, you can create and digitize your training instantly. For WiseTrainer (3D simulators), expect about 1 month after receiving your photos to deliver your custom environment.

pricingModel.question: How does pricing work?
pricingModel.answer: WiseTwin offers 3 plans: Free (up to 3 users, 1 LOTO WiseTrainer included), Pro at 189€/month per admin (up to 100 users, SSO & MFA), and Business at 249€/month per admin (unlimited users, cross-company sharing). WiseTrainer simulators are billed separately based on the chosen range, with -20% on your first order.

security.question: How do you handle data security?
security.answer: We offer enterprise SSO (SAML/OAuth), multi-factor authentication (MFA), complete audit logs, and strict data isolation per organization. These features are available from the Pro plan.

whatIsWiseTrainer.question: What is WiseTrainer?
whatIsWiseTrainer.answer: WiseTrainer is our immersive 3D simulator solution. We recreate your industrial facilities in 3D from photos or on-site scans. Your teams can train on exact replicas of their work environment, simulating dangerous situations safely.

whatIsWisePaper.question: What is WisePaper?
whatIsWisePaper.answer: WisePaper is our text-based training digitization tool, included free in all plans. You can create courses like on Notion, or import your existing documents (PDF, Word, PowerPoint). Our AI automatically generates quizzes to validate learning.

wisetrainerPricing.question: How much does a WiseTrainer simulator cost?
wisetrainerPricing.answer: WiseTrainer environment development starts at 6,000€ for the Safe Range (safety) and 9,600€ for the Tech Range (maintenance). Each additional scenario costs 500€. Pro subscribers get -30% on their first WiseTrainer, and Business subscribers get -50%.

noVrHeadset.question: Do I need a VR headset to use WiseTwin?
noVrHeadset.answer: No! WiseTwin is 100% accessible from a standard web browser. Your training works on PC, tablet, or mobile, with no special equipment needed. This is one of our main advantages: 0€ equipment investment.

trainingTypes.question: What types of training can I create?
trainingTypes.answer: You can create immersive 3D environment training with WiseTrainer (safety, maintenance, lockout...), digitize your existing documents with WisePaper (procedures, manuals...), and create complete training paths with learner tracking.

existingContent.question: Does WiseTwin work with our existing content?
existingContent.answer: Absolutely! With WisePaper, import your PDFs, PowerPoints, Word docs, or Google Docs. Our AI transforms them into interactive training modules with automatic quiz generation. You keep your existing content while adding learner tracking.

languages.question: What languages is WiseTwin available in?
languages.answer: The WiseTwin platform is available in French and English. WiseTrainer simulators can be configured in the language of your choice according to your needs.

economicBenefits.question: What are the economic benefits?
economicBenefits.answer: WiseTwin helps reduce training costs (less travel, infinitely repeatable training at no extra cost), improve knowledge retention through immersion, and decrease accidents through better preparation. The management platform is included at no extra cost in your license.

progressTracking.question: How does progress tracking work?
progressTracking.answer: WiseTwin includes a complete management platform with detailed dashboards, per-learner progress tracking, performance scores, QR code certifications, and exportable statistics. You can also create personalized training plans.

installation.question: Does WiseTwin require installation?
installation.answer: No! WiseTwin is 100% online and accessible from any modern web browser, with no installation required. Your learners can train from anywhere.

trainingPlans.question: How do you manage training plans?
trainingPlans.answer: You can create personalized training plans, associate WiseTrainer and WisePaper modules, assign learners, and track progress in real-time. Automatic reminders can be sent to learners who are behind.

hrIntegration.question: Can WiseTwin integrate with our existing systems?
hrIntegration.answer: Yes! WiseTwin supports SSO (SAML/OAuth) for unified login with your enterprise systems. Our training is also SCORM compatible for integration into your existing LMS.

certifications.question: How do certifications work?
certifications.answer: Certifications are automatically generated with a unique QR code to verify their authenticity. They are sent by email as soon as a learner validates a training and can be downloaded from their personal space.

reminders.question: Can I send reminders to learners?
reminders.answer: Yes! The platform has an automatic email reminder system. You can target all learners who are behind on a training plan or send individual reminders.

guestMode.question: How do I manage external learners (temps, subcontractors)?
guestMode.answer: WiseTwin offers a guest mode that allows you to add external learners without a professional email address. Ideal for quickly training temporary workers or subcontractors on your safety procedures.

multiSite.question: Does WiseTwin handle multi-site industries?
multiSite.answer: Perfectly! WiseTwin supports multi-organization management with granular permissions per site. The Business plan also allows cross-company sharing to share training with your partners.

support.question: What support is available?
support.answer: The Free plan includes email support. The Pro plan offers priority support. The Business plan includes dedicated support with personalized guidance for deploying and using WiseTwin.

createSimulator.question: How does WiseTrainer simulator creation work?
createSimulator.answer: The process is simple: 1) Request a quote to define your needs, 2) Send photos of your facilities (or on-site scan by our team), 3) 3D modeling in collaboration with your business experts, 4) Co-creation of pedagogical scenarios, 5) Delivery in about 1 month.

assetOwnership.question: Who owns the 3D asset created for my company?
assetOwnership.answer: The 3D environment custom-built for your company belongs to you 100%. You own the digital asset created from your facilities. It's your investment, your intellectual property.

scenarioTypes.question: What types of scenarios can be created?
scenarioTypes.answer: We offer two ranges: Safe (safety) for safety procedures, emergency gestures, PPE use, fire evacuation, chemical leaks; and Tech (maintenance) for maintenance operations, fault diagnosis, lockout/tagout. Each environment includes 3 base scenarios.

hybridTraining.question: Is WiseTwin compatible with in-person training?
hybridTraining.answer: Yes! Even though there's no native "group" feature yet, you can run in-person sessions with WiseTwin. Equip your learners with tablets and lead a WisePaper course with a facilitator who expands on the content in real-time while each participant answers quizzes on their device.

technicalRequirements.question: What are the technical requirements to use WiseTwin?
technicalRequirements.answer: WiseTwin is compatible with all modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge). The only technical requirement is WebGL support to display 3D environments. A good internet connection is recommended for quickly loading WiseTrainer simulators.

gdprCompliance.question: How is my learners' data protected?
gdprCompliance.answer: WiseTwin is 100% GDPR compliant. All your data is hosted on European servers: we use Neon for databases and Azure for Unity builds of 3D simulators. Your data never leaves Europe.

freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial period?
freeTrial.answer: The platform is completely free during your training development phase. You only move to a paid plan when your learners actually start training. This allows you to take the time to create your content with no commitment.
